statements: SELECT * FROM coach_assignments;
SELECT head_coach_name, assistant_coach_1_name, assistant_coach_2_name FROM coach_assignments;
SELECT team_id, head_coach_name FROM coach_assignments WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT head_coach_name, assistant_coach_1_name FROM coach_assignments WHERE head_coach_id = 101;
SELECT team_id, head_coach_name, assistant_coach_1_name, assistant_coach_2_name FROM coach_assignments ORDER BY team_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM coach_assignments WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT head_coach_id, head_coach_name FROM coach_assignments WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT team_id, head_coach_id, assistant_coach_1_id, assistant_coach_2_id FROM coach_assignments WHERE head_coach_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT team_id, head_coach_name, assistant_coach_1_name FROM coach_assignments WHERE assistant_coach_2_name IS NULL;
SELECT team_id, head_coach_id, assistant_coach_1_id, assistant_coach_2_id FROM coach_assignments WHERE head_coach_id > assistant_coach_2_id;
SELECT * FROM teams;
SELECT coach_name, role FROM coaches WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT coach_name FROM coaches WHERE team_id = 2 ORDER BY coach_name ASC;
SELECT team_name FROM teams WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM teams WHERE team_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM teams;
SELECT team_name, team_id FROM teams ORDER BY team_id DESC;
SELECT coach_name, role, team_name FROM coaches JOIN teams ON coaches.team_id = teams.team_id;
SELECT coach_name, role FROM coaches WHERE team_id = 101 ORDER BY coach_name ASC;
SELECT coach_name, role, team_name FROM coaches JOIN teams ON coaches.team_id = teams.team_id WHERE role = 'Head Coach';
SELECT * FROM team;
SELECT team_name FROM team WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, team_id FROM team ORDER BY team_id DESC;
SELECT coach_name FROM head_coach WHERE team_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT assistant_coach_name FROM assistant_coach WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT team_name FROM team WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT coach_name, assistant_coach_name FROM head_coach JOIN assistant_coach ON head_coach.team_id = assistant_coach.team_id;
SELECT team_name, coach_name, assistant_coach_name FROM team JOIN head_coach ON team.team_id = head_coach.team_id JOIN assistant_coach ON team.team_id = assistant_coach.team_id;
SELECT coach_name FROM head_coach WHERE team_id IN (SELECT team_id FROM team WHERE team_name = 'Lakers');
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS num_coaches FROM team JOIN head_coach ON team.team_id = head_coach.team_id GROUP BY team_name HAVING num_coaches >= 2;
SELECT * FROM teams;
SELECT team_name, head_coach FROM teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, head_coach FROM teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, head_coach FROM teams WHERE team_name LIKE '%s';
SELECT team_name, head_coach FROM teams WHERE team_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT * FROM teams;
SELECT team_name, head_coach FROM teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, head_coach FROM teams WHERE team_name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT teams.team_name, head_coaches.head_coach_name FROM teams JOIN team_coaches ON teams.team_id = team_coaches.team_id JOIN head_coaches ON team_coaches.head_coach_id = head_coaches.head_coach_id;

SELECT DISTINCT teams.team_name, head_coaches.head_coach_name FROM teams, team_coaches, head_coaches WHERE teams.team_id = team_coaches.team_id AND head_coaches.head_coach_id = team_coaches.head_coach_id ORDER BY teams.team_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Team;
SELECT team_name, home_city FROM Team ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT head_coach, team_name FROM Team WHERE home_city = 'New York';
SELECT coach_name, Team.team_name FROM Coach INNER JOIN Team ON Coach.team_id = Team.team_id;
SELECT player_name, Team.team_name FROM Player INNER JOIN Team ON Player.team_id = Team.team_id WHERE Player.player_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM Team;
SELECT team_name, head_coach FROM Team WHERE home_city = 'New York';
SELECT coach_name, team_name FROM Coach JOIN Team ON Coach.team_id = Team.team_id ORDER BY coach_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM Player JOIN Team ON Player.team_id = Team.team_id WHERE team_name LIKE '%City';
SELECT stadium_name, capacity, home_team_id FROM Stadium JOIN Team ON Stadium.home_team_id = Team.team_id WHERE capacity > 50000;
